column4: i've a problem with streaming. i cant see some which use windows media, so i tried to install realplayer 11 on ubuntu 8.04. The installation works, but i cant find rp11 on applications. itried to reinstall, but it seems it's already installed. also the re-installations worked
as far as streaming wmv, you can do that without realplayer. have you installed ubuntu-restricted-extras?
if all else fails, try VLC. it plays *everything*
